# Extração

```{r}
#| label: extracao-search-post

querys <- 
  c('cblol','lol')

posts <-
  search_post(
    q = querys,
    limit = 13L,
    since = "2024-08-30",
    until = "2024-09-08"
  ) |>
  select(
    handle = author_handle,
    repost_count,
    uri 
  )

view(posts)
```

```{r}
#| label: estracao-get-reposts

  #posts$repost_count |> 
  #dplyr::filter(repost > 0) |>

safe_get_reposts <- 
  purrr::possibly(
    get_reposts, 
    otherwise = tibble()
    )

reposts <- 
  posts$uri |>
  purrr::map_dfr( 
    function(repost) { 
      url <- convert_at_to_http(repost)
      safe_get_reposts(post_url = url) |> 
        dplyr::mutate(from = repost) #está renomeando? 
    } 
  ) 


View(reposts)
```
